where brd_id=#{brd_id} and post_content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where brd_id=#{brd_id} and post_title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or post_content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or post_writer like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
